messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The last shift had too many bugs from the report I have. Lets make sure, it doesn't happen again,

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The bridge is now selling BATS! for "self defence" so come on down with something to trade and we can make a deal!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Hydroponics.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Big Billy's Milkytime Fun Factory, please stand-by.
